page.title: 06Education in N/Ham/Coll P
page.content: In the North Hammersmith and College Park area there are fourteen schools. They are three secondary schools for children aged 11 to 18 years, Hammersmith, Burlington Danes and Cardinal and Sion Manning. There are ten primary schools for children aged from 5 to 11 years. Most of the schools are in the south and east parts of the area due to the concentration of people. The secondary schools have more pupils than the primary schools; about 1,000 compared with 200.The teacher in the secondary school teaches only one or two subjects to nearly all the children.The primary school teacher teaches all subjects to the same group of chidren.The children are at school from 9am to about 4p.m. There is one college of Further Education for adults.
